channel.title: National Security on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in National Security on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: How China’s Patriotic ‘Honkers’ Became the Nation’s Elite Cyberspies
item.description: A new report traces the history of the early wave of Chinese hackers who became the backbone of the state’s espionage apparatus.
